definition: "to obtain qi", the sensation of electrical tingling, numbness, soreness etc at the meridian where accupuncture needle is inserted
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: There are also some supplementary manipulations to increase the needling sensations.
sentences.chinese: 另有一些辅助手法用以加强得气的感觉。

definition: to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)
to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
(feng shui) beneficial influence, esp. from one's ancestral graves/to confer a beneficial influence
to hit a pressure point (martial arts)/dim mak/see also 點脈|点脉[dian3 mai4]
